mdRecord.dcterms:title: The International Council of Religious Education Certificates of Achievement
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Three certificates awarded to Hunter C. Howard by the International Council of Religious Education. First for completing training in the New Testament in Floyd, Virginia on September 24, 1926. Second for completing The Old Testament of the Standard Leadership Curriculum on August 19, 1927. Third for Training in Worship and the Devotional Life on June 29, 1928.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Bible Study
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
